version_description:
-NEW LEVELS ADDED! Discover all new worlds and figures!
-Improved user experience and game stability!
Bugfix release.
Bugfix

It's time for a cool new update!

- 7 new stunning landscapes with more than 100 exciting levels!

- New fun mechanics! Introducing Balloons, Ice Cubes, Bubble Machines and more!

- Now you can play a Bonus Round game when you reach the landscape door and win prizes!

Download now and keep matching bricks!

It's time for a cool new update!

- 7 new stunning landscapes with more than 100 exciting levels!

- New fun mechanics! Introducing Balloons, Ice Cubes, Bubble Machines and more!

- Now you can play a Bonus Round game when you reach the landscape door and win prizes!

Download now and keep matching bricks!

BRIX! Block Blast is now available!

Download now and start matching & blasting blocks! Enjoy this wonderful puzzle game!

Thank you for playing BRIX! Block Blast! In this new update, you will find 45 brand new levels!

Furthermore, we have fixed some bugs and improved game performance!

Thank you for playing BRIX! In this new major update you will find:

-60 brand new levels!
-Tournaments: Compete worldwide and win amazing prizes.
-Brixpedia: Collect cards and complete the collection.
-New Daily Rewards Calendar.
-Visual improvements.
-Bugs fixed & improved performance.

We hope you keep enjoying our game!

Thank you for playing BRIX! In this new update we have:

-Added 15 brand new levels!
-Improved visual effects.
-Solved minor problems.
-Fixed some sound effects.

We hope you keep enjoying our game!

Thank you for playing BRIX! Check out these new features:

-Added 30 brand new levels!
-Improved performance.
-Solved little problems.
-Fixed some visual effects.

We hope you keep enjoying BRIX!

We have fixed some minor and stability problems!
Thank you for playing BRIX!

Thank you for playing BRIX! In this new update you will find:

-30 brand new levels!
-Black balloons, a new block to blast!
-We have fixed some bugs and improved stability.

Keep matching!
We are working on new levels and fun mechanics that will be available soon. Meanwhile this version fixes some bugs that improve the stability of the game.
Brix! is back with a new fresh update! Play 30 new levels presenting the new double brick!  Memory and battery consumption has been improved! Download it right now and have fun!
This is a hotfix update for users experiencing some issues. New content version coming up for next week!
It's time for a new adventure on Route 66! Enjoy 30 new levels!

Introducing the brand new WILD BRICK booster and the MATCH STREAK bonus.

In this new update you will find:
- Brand new WILD BRICK booster that can match with any colour brick on the board.
- New MATCH STREAK bonus that rewards you for matching multiple sets of blocks move after move.
- 15 brand new levels!
- Bug Fixes
